channel.title: How come everytime I wear a thieving cape (t) or Woodcutting cape (t)
channel.description: Everytime I wear a thieving cape (t) or woodcutting cape (t) it shows up as a ss in my hand for the thieving cape and a ss on the ground for the woodcuting cape.

The problem is the model - You need to find a new model for that item and import it into your client.

item.dc:creator: @Eddie12390 Eddie12390
item.description:
@Eddie12390 wrote:

A lot of the sources i have tried don’t have thieving cape (T) working. Each source is just built off another source, so if the person got a source and didn’t fix that problem, you still get the problem.
